title: my mouse disappears when on the rift. did all the requrements on your support guide. #WTFRiot
body: this sucks because I shot riot support an email over a week ago and still haven't gotten a response. fix your game now!

replies.body:
I wasn't able to find a support ticket under your summoner name, but I suspect there may be a background program interfering with your mouse cursor. I strongly suggest [performing a clean boot](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq3) to see if the issue is resolved.

Let me know what happens.
